Title: Mediation body
Description: The body responsible for mediation procedures.

Title: Central purchasing body
Description: The procuring entity providing centralized purchasing activities and, possibly, ancillary purchasing activities.

Title: Process contact point
Description: A contact point dedicated to this contracting process.

Title: Review contact point
Description: The service from which information about the review procedure can be obtained.

Title: Selected participant
Description: A party that has already been selected to participate in the design contest.

Title: Information service
Description: An organization that can provide information regarding specific aspects of the contracting process.

Title: Procurement service provider
Description: An organization that provides ancillary procurement services to buyers.

Title: TED eSender
Description: An organization that provides data transfer services to buyers.

Title: Lead buyer
Description: The lead buyer in a group of buyers.

Title: Awarding central purchasing body
Description: A central purchasing body awarding public contracts or concluding framework agreements for goods, services or works intended for other buyers.

Title: Acquiring central purchasing body
Description: A central purchasing body acquiring goods, services or works intended for other buyers.

Title: Lead tenderer
Description: The lead tenderer in the case of a consortium or equivalent.

Title: Evaluation body
Description: The organization responsible for evaluating bids or requests to participate.

Title: Submission receipt body
Description: The organization responsible for receiving bids or requests to participate.
